__e: You've been in that cage six months, shining boots and fixing weapons waiting for a second chance.
See if you can't find some boots and a parka for this man.
I put his boots and clothes ready every night... but they are there still in the morning.
Faith doesn't put food in our bellies, or clothes on our backs, or boots on our feet.
You don't want to talk to broads with boots on.
I had on boots last night before I left.
